name: userTSPs
description:
A user can have a maximum of two TSP accounts. Use this API to list all TSP accounts of a user.

**Scopes:** `tsp:read:admin` `tsp:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

userId.description: The user ID or email address of the user. For user-level apps, pass `me` as the value for userId.
